attributes.action: Reverse the conservative mini budget to stabilise the UK economy
attributes.additional_details:
Revise the budget regarding:

- Income tax cut to 19%
- Scrapping 45% income tax
- Reduction in dividend tax
- Reduction in NI
- 19% corporation tax
- Not imposing an increase in windfall tax on energy/oil/fuel companies 

The current windfall tax is expected to produce a revenue of £7.7bn the year before an energy cap increase of 100%. The government should therefore consider an increase proportional to the increase in revenue
attributes.background: Reconsider and revise the budget to strengthen the pound, lower interest rates and stabilise the economy

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623684
